details.description: The exported interface `Account` lacks a description and property documentation; consumers need to know the purpose and expected invariants of its fields.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc describing the interface and individual property descriptions (id, balance).

details.description: The exported function `calculateInterest` lacks documentation explaining parameter semantics, expected units (rate interpretation), return value, and edge cases.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc with descriptions for `balance` and `rate`, clarify that `rate` is a multiplier (e.g., 0.05 = 5%), and note that no input validation is performed.

details.description: The exported class `AccountService` has no class-level documentation describing responsibilities, storage semantics, or lifetime considerations.
details.fix_explanation: Add class-level JSDoc describing that it manages accounts in-memory using a Map and note behavior such as lack of persistence.

details.description: Public method `getAccount` lacks documentation; should specify return behavior (returns `Account` or `null`) and lookup semantics.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc clarifying that it returns the `Account` if found or `null` otherwise and that it performs an in-memory lookup.

details.description: Public method `saveAccount` lacks documentation; important to describe that it will insert or overwrite accounts by `id`.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc indicating the method saves an account into the internal store and that existing accounts with the same `id` will be overwritten.
